definition: to force (sb to do sth)/to compel/to press for/to extort/to press on towards/to press up to/to close in on/euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
to push sb too far/to go too far (in oppressing people)

sentences.english: Hang down on ear object the clear lapidary spirit gas like water is threatening.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵上垂坠水滴般清透的宝石灵气逼人。

sentences.english: I've always believed that aggressive southpaws are able to put hands on Marquez.
sentences.chinese: 我一直认为咄咄逼人的左撇子拳手能够击中马奎兹。

sentences.english: Why are Chinese jets being aggressive against any non-Chinese military presence here?
sentences.chinese: 为什么中国飞机对南海的非中国军事存在咄咄逼人。

sentences.english: His relentless aggression bludgeons you into seeing his point.
sentences.chinese: 他咄咄逼人地强迫你了解他的看法。

sentences.english: Market economy, riches and honour is threatening.
It was five and a half o'clock now, and a raw, blustering morning.
sentences.chinese: 这时才五点半，正是寒气逼人，狂风咆哮的早晨。

sentences.english: And to her it seemed that the angle of his jaw had changed; its pitch had become unpleasantly aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 在她眼里他那下腭已棱角毕露，开合时咄咄逼人。

sentences.english: South-east Europe, in particular, continued to feel the chill.
sentences.chinese: 尤其受到事件影响的欧洲东南部目前依然寒气逼人。

sentences.english: One mistake other guys make is to be too aggressive with women.
sentences.chinese: 有些人常犯的一个错误是他们追女人时太咄咄逼人了。

sentences.english: His wife was seated kerbside, despite the nighttime chill.
sentences.chinese: 尽管夜寒逼人，他的妻子还是坐在马路边上。

sentences.english: The film is in lurid colors, a pulp counterpoint to the elegance of the action.
sentences.chinese: 影片的色彩浓的逼人，森森鬼气呼应着优雅的动作。

sentences.english: Wear bold jewelry and outfits that hug your body or are kind of slinky.
sentences.chinese: 在身上戴满大胆的首饰和装备，真是曲线逼人。

sentences.english: An insistent voice instructed him to paint a wall of the room in black.
sentences.chinese: 一个咄咄逼人的声音指示他把房间的一面墙漆成黑色。

sentences.english: He's always making unwarranted accusations against others. His manner is intolerably aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 他动不动就对别人横加指责，气势逼人。

sentences.english: The wind remained low but the cold was intense.
sentences.chinese: 风仍然不大，但寒气十分逼人。

definition: murderous spirit/aura of death/to vent one's anger
to look at from close up/to watch intently
lit. sth hits one in the face/directly in one's face/sth assaults the senses/blatant (advertising)/eye-catching/(a smell) assaults the nostrils
(of a perfume or a foul odor) permeating the whole place/(of grease etc) dripping everywhere/flowing all over the place
